name: hop-monolith
description: Backend and web client for Hop!
author: Robert Saunders and James Simpson

scripts.bootstrap: npm install --unsafe-perm || ((if [ -f npm-debug.log ]; then cat npm-debug.log; fi) && false) && lerna bootstrap --hoist
scripts.build: npm run test && lerna run build --stream
scripts.dev: lerna run build --scope hop-email && lerna run dev --scope hop-server --scope hop-client --stream --parallel
